dataList.dlg: Uh... Hang on a sec. I just have to top the tree, and... whew, it's done! Isn't it pretty? ... Huh?! We're setting off now?

Days like this, you've gotta be an early reindeer~ We were supposed to go to sleep after hanging up the Christmas balls, but with all the sorties and drills... There wasn't even a second to spare. Hey, Ishy, you can start from there and hang the lights~

Brace your antlers, 'cause we're having the biggest damn turkey for lunch~ Whew, it's the latest gene-jazzed deluxe bird from K Corp., and it costs a whole paycheck~ Man, good thing I wasn't the one who lost that round of rock-paper-scissors. Heheh.
Ugh... Not this again... the turkey I put in the oven is gonna get cold... and now I'll have to peel off all the decos, too...

Sure, the antlers are killing me, but I'm not gonna take those painkillers 'cause today's the day I uncork that bottle! Believe me~ a nice glass of wine always works better than some stupid pill, okay?

It's 'cause we look all grumpy, that's why the other packs don't wanna team up with us~ Maybe we can use this chance to cozy up to the others and score a nice friendly dinner too...!
... Oh, so it's not 'cause we're always so sour? They're just scared the mind whip'll zap them...?
Mmgh, wish they'd let us ditch these battle suits and chill for a bit... This company's no joke with the rules. Well... guess orange and red capes sorta match the holiday mood, huh~
Hah~ What. A shit. Show. Why's this stupid bulb flickering now? It's pissing me off! Agh, ngh! How'd these wires get this tangled?! *sigh* Whatever, we gotta go! Mobilize!

Ha ha ha. Isn't that convenient? A quick shower with blood, and I don't even need to go out looking for a costume! And with this dangling from my head, we won't even need a tree! And would you look at that! My helmet's all red and glowy! I'm pretty much a holiday reindeer! Ha ha ha...
Better not cry, better not cry~ Hah...
... Yeah, Merry Christmas to us all. Let there be blessings or whatever to all the poor souls working the holy night away.
Condensed electromagnetic wave focus, charged and ready. Ngh.
So it's gonna be cold turkey... for dinner, I mean.
... Ha ha. Would ya look at that. Everybody's twinkle-twinkle.
Why's it gotta be today...? Why's it gotta be just the 4th Pack Reindeer, why's it gotta be just me and my roomies for this mission, huh...?
Hah, I'll zap you in all the pretty colors. It's the Christmas special.
Ngh, nngh...
Good kids on the nice list woulda gone easy on you... agh. Too bad we're on the naughty list, huh?
This... is the worst... I'll be one... morbid Christmas tree...
Bingo! Here's a present for you!
Bzzt! ...Ugh. Yeah, today's not our day, huh?
3... 2... 1... And with that, Christmas is officially yesterday... Mission accomplished... and our team's down to 2.

Ooh...? Hey, we wrapped that up ahead of schedule! Y-you guys aren't all tuckered out, right? Let's head back for the Christmas feast! We just gotta reheat 'em a little, y'know...! C'mon, move your butts! We still got, like, 3 hours' til Christmas ends!

Agh... nngh... my antlers... my head... they hurt so much... They're all gone... it's so... silent... Everyone's dead... even the guys... on my team... Was I the one who...?
Ah... ahh...! Arrrgggh!!!
